instruction: Provide hunting advice based on environmental conditions
input: Location: Maryland, Tags: pressure, deer, weather, success
output: Hunted yesterday after 0.04" pressure drop. Saw 8 deer between 3-5pm. Temperature was 42°F with light north wind. Best hunt all season.

instruction: Provide hunting advice based on environmental conditions
input: Location: Ohio, Tags: moon phase, deer, feeding, timing
output: New moon this week brought incredible deer activity during daylight. They fed until 7:30am instead of usual 6:00am. Harvested nice 8-point at 7:15am.
